website_summaries.verdict: This entry-level contender is a great choice for those who are new to diabetic blood glucose testing and dread the idea of painful finger sticks. The ultra-thin lancets and gentle spring action combine to create a less painful experience.
pros: Very gentle spring action creates a nearly painless delivery
Fits most travel-size test kits easily
Works on alternative sites, such as forearm
cons: Lancets may be too wide to fit lancing device properly
Spring mechanism has a hair trigger

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about this product, it will put a hole in your finger and make you bleed. Would I recommend it? I would wish that no one would have to use one of these but it does work for what it was intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for Bayer lancing device.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item to replace my Bayer lancing device. The device received was identical to the Bayer lancing device that came with my Bayer Contour glucose meter. The lancets received work fine although they do not fit as snugly in the lancing device as the Bayer brand lancets do. It is necessary to make sure the lancet cap is loosened (twist cap to loosen) so that the lancet once inserted into the lancing device doesn't slip forward when the lancet cap is pulled off prior to use. I will likely purchase this item again as the lancing device wears out from use. Recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: Old Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Super perfect hit!
customer_reviews.text: This is IMO one of the best finger pricking devices. Not too hard. Just hard enough to get the blood.
customer_reviews.author: doug bowen

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable--less pinch for the inch
customer_reviews.text: Lancing device works great, has adjustable forces (nice to me) and this transaction was very good for the supplier provided as promised in a timely manner. One came with the Contour Next kit but another one wont hurt-with the deal on the + 100 lancets you get. They do work fine but require a little more patience than the Bayer Microlets (10 came w/the meter) when loading. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Too Fragile
customer_reviews.text: The 30 gauge Active Forward lancets were too easily bent, and I really did not see much comfort difference from the standard 28 gauge Microlet lancets. Will use the box of 100 and will probably not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: rellimmelc

customer_reviews.title: No instruction provided on how to use
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturers should not assume the person ordering has any idea how to use it. Not enough info provide on how to use the lancet device holder. Bought to keep on hand for a diabetic employee and none of us knew how to use it. Thanks goodness for google. Place some simple how to in the box for the non diabetic person seeking to help.
customer_reviews.author: donna e stewart

customer_reviews.title: It works very well, easy to load, set and use.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it uses generic lancets. It is also solidly well built, light weight, trustworth, easy to eject old lancelet, insert new one, and easy to set and use. I like it
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Hurts more than previous lancet
customer_reviews.text: You have to push the device hard on your finger to get the needle to reach. And when it does it hurts. I have been using one for years and it was always uncomfortable but never hurt. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Lancer
customer_reviews.text: great product, adjustabe works well with almost no pain. I use it 4 to 6 times a day
customer_reviews.author: kameraman

customer_reviews.title: This device is smaller than our previous Microlet, but ...
customer_reviews.text: This device is smaller than our previous Microlet, but should do the trick as well. We just received it, but I'm certain my hubby will get used to it. It came very quickly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne G.,

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a replacement for my son. The other one he had (same brand) lasted a year which I think is good considering he checks his blood sugar 2-3 times a day. The lancets were a nice added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi 42

customer_reviews.title: Nearly painless
customer_reviews.text: Liked that the needle is thin (30gage), & that you control the depth.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Lancets look different than the others I have from this brand. They also arrived in a ziplock style bag inside of the box instead of a sealed plastic wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easily holds the larger lancets and works great, been using this brand for a few years now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: The lancing device works perfectly. I dropped and broke one that came with my blood glucose monitor. This is a perfect replacement and fits into my monitor case with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ShopMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, my old one was dead
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, my old one was dead, this one is way better & and does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: I OPENED THE PACKAGE AND ONE OF THE ENDCAPS FOR THE LANCET DEVICE IS MISSING.
customer_reviews.text: IT LOOKS LIKE SOMEONE TOOK THE ENDCAP OUT OF THE PACKAGE THEN SHIPPED IT TO ME BECAUSE THE ENVELOPE THEY WERE SHIPPED IN WAS NOT TORN SO IT WAS MISSING WHEN SHIPPED AND THEY STILL SENT TO ME ANYWAYS PAID OVER 10.00 PER BOX.
customer_reviews.author: Jason c.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading you don’t get what you ordered.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product I ordered. The picture and description of what I ordered is different from the one I received. I tried to order the one i wanted again and I bought it and then the order that shows up in my orders list is not the one I just clicked on.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Partain

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for me! It was easy to put together and the middle prick didn't hurt a bit.
customer_reviews.author: jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: Looking for diabetes supplies I stumbled onto this great product. Well made device with lancets that are fine and painless to use. Highly recommend to anyone needing new supplies.
customer_reviews.author: thomas e. kulik

customer_reviews.title: Needles & reacher
customer_reviews.text: The needles are practically pain free! The reacher better than the local drugstore prices & works well, too! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: emeraldanne

customer_reviews.title: Received next day
customer_reviews.text: Product standard lancets for my glucose meter. Came in an extremely timely fashion!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Bayer Microlet lancing device.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad to have a Bayer Microlet 2 Lancing Device again. My old one I had for six years quit working. I tried two other brands and was not satisfied with them. I have yet to use the Lancets as I am finishing up some I already have.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you want finger damage.  Lancets aren’t correct size.
customer_reviews.text: Needle goes in sideways and stays in finger because lancets don’t fit in device. They are loose and wobble. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: jeffwheels

customer_reviews.title: ... as the one i have and it works just fine..
customer_reviews.text: the lancing device is the same as the one i have and it works just fine...no problems...but these lancets that came with it were not very good...about half of them were defective in that when you tried to pull the tops off the entire needle came out of the plastic. If it had just been one or two..no problem..but it is no exaggeration to say about half of them were defective and completely unusable. I do buy my supplies from amazon most all the time simply because I get them faster than anywhere else I buy them, but this is the first time the lancets have been so completely defective.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa West

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Had my other lancing device for years and it finally wore out. It is easy to use and I like the 3 level of pressure you can set.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cammarata

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite lancing device
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for this lancer. The lancets don't stay in very well and don't have support to keep them from going off to the side which caused it to jam a few times.
customer_reviews.author: ReggiSaurusRex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and love the price
customer_reviews.text: The settings only went up to 5 others go to 7.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES FORD

customer_reviews.title: When my first lancing broke after I don't know how ...
customer_reviews.text: When my first lancing broke after I don't know how many years, I thought I wouldn't find another. But, Bayer came through again. And the lancets are always sharp.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good to buy.I don't know if there are any better.
customer_reviews.author: skm

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, would buy even if lancets weren't included. Price good. Lasting device; replacing one I've had for at least 5+years. Like the way it shoots out used lancet. Recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: decent product
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. Usually I barely even feel it.

customer_reviews.title: I'll surely be back for more soon!
customer_reviews.text: great products! these will make my daily blood tests not needing any lancets for awhile!
customer_reviews.author: dave rogers

customer_reviews.title: It is simple for following blood sugar.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It replaced mine that broke and does what it’s suppose to.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for keto testing
customer_reviews.text: Good unit. It actually came with a lancet but doesn't say so in the description.

customer_reviews.title: Good for use with bayer lancets

customer_reviews.text: My in-laws are diabetic and arthritic and this is the only device they can use with ease. It also last longer than any of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less painful.
customer_reviews.text: The adjustment Is more accurate than the lancing device I had been using. Less painful.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think inserting the lancets is tricky. It works well though!
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: It felt like the spring was installed backwards
customer_reviews.text: The lancing device was broken in a sealed package. I'm assuming it wasn't the fault of the seller but the manufacturer. It felt like the spring was installed backwards. The cocking device on the bottom would spring out but not back in. It's suppose to be cocked out when a lancet is put into the top of the lancing device. I had a prior one and it broke after a few months using it. I thought I'd give it one more try. Thankfully I have a spare one from a different manufacturer. No more Bayer lancing devices for me.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! size is great for me to use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my husband. It came on time. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the lancet device isn't quite long enough to poke the skin.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted at a lower price than locally.
customer_reviews.author: Alicesan S

customer_reviews.title: It was ok. Sometimes it took a few times ...
customer_reviews.text: It was ok. Sometimes it took a few times too get enough blood. Could be me too.
customer_reviews.author: JR Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Missing alternate site tip
customer_reviews.text: This device is missing the alternate site tip which allows blood samples from alternate sites (fore arms, etc) instead of the fingertip. The fingertip version doesn't go deep enough to get a decent sample from the arm (I don't test using the fingertip). I know that the microlet normal does come with that alternate tip, but for some reason was removed from this version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Lancet
customer_reviews.text: Love this small adjustable lancet. It takes up less room in my little bag with testing strips and Contour next Link Monitor, and the adjustab feature makes it what I would call painless to use. My only complaint is that these only seem to last a little over a year before the cocking mechanism fails. I test 5-8 times a day, so it does get a workout. I'm on my 3rd Microlet, but would replace it again if/when it fails with another just like it...unless the price goes higher.
customer_reviews.author: T'sThoughts

customer_reviews.title: painful puncture
customer_reviews.text: maybe mine was a little defective but it doesn't work as good as my original bought with blood glucose monitor, it makes the procedure more painful.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Z.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as others at a fraction of the cost. If insurance won't cover your Diabetic testing equipment this is a wonderful option and the results are as acurate as brands costing 3 times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Meseke

customer_reviews.title: I go through these so fast as the spring breaks so easily. Finally
customer_reviews.text: These don't last long at all. I go through these so fast as the spring breaks so easily. Finally, I called the manufacturer and they said they have a new lancet to replace it. The new ones are great and last.
customer_reviews.author: Laleh Maciel

customer_reviews.title: Bayer is best and pasted the tests!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one I wore out? After 3 years! Yank You Mr. BAYER!
customer_reviews.author: What's My line?

customer_reviews.title: Kitty diagnosed with diabetes <1week ago, needed lancets. ...
customer_reviews.text: Kitty diagnosed with diabetes <1week ago, needed lancets. Stressed "mom" needs appropriate supplies.....arrived well before the lancets were needed! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: christopher morey

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: I wish we could get the original Freestyle devices again - they really are THE BEST. Unfortunately they do wear out after a few years. I've bought four others to use and none of them were even close to satisfactory. One kept falling apart when I tried to use it. This one is the best replacement I have found, and glad I finally did. It is easy to load and and change depth.
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: Best lancet, in the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love this lancet!!! Very practical. It does not hurt when I check my blood. Will definitely buying another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maya834

customer_reviews.title: Just 4 This type of lancet
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use the "One Touch Ultra" lancets with this and it will not work but with it's own it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: William Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Not made for Bayer lancing device.
customer_reviews.text: My original Bayer lancing device stopped working so I purchased this combo pack since you always have to reorder lancets anyway. The Active Forward lancets that were in the combo pack do not fit the Bayer device however. They sit loosely, sometimes work, sometimes don’t. I have to use a second lancet more often than not. I have no other complaint with the lancets and they probably work fine with other devices.
customer_reviews.author: justmyopinion

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. The hole it punctures seems inconsistent though. Sometimes I need it at a 4 setting and sometimes a 3 or even a 5 for there to be enough of a sample.
customer_reviews.author: Optimus Primus

customer_reviews.title: simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times, but it's very simple and easy to use. It reads quickly and requires only a very small sample and is not coded.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and smaller...less discomfort
customer_reviews.text: These Microlet 30g lancets, along with the small lancing device, are level up from my old Accucheck device. I like them, and they are easy to use. I ordered these for a trial, and now I am going to stick with them.
customer_reviews.author: Iatros

customer_reviews.title: It just didn’t do it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for taking my INRs to measure my blood coagulation rate. The ones I was using were not penetrating deep enough to generate an adequate blood drop. I always heat my hand prior to lancing it to assure I get sufficient amount of blood. I found this product to be both awkward to load with their lancets and insufficient depth. And I set it on its deepest setting. Overall, I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mxpalazzo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The crappy lancing device that comes with the meter does not work half of the time. This lancing device works ALL of the time. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Malmberg

customer_reviews.title: Good Stick, Minimal Pain
customer_reviews.text: I have an autistic child with diabetes, so I needed a device that could get a good stick with minimal pain. This device has been very effective. I have used it on myself as well-- minimal pain. Makes taking blood sugars so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Mother approved !!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my Mom and she loves it !! She previously had this lancing device and when it finally quit working she was very upset so when I found it on Amazon she was so happy !! I would recommend this item based on my Moms use of it !!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Decker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - exactly what we needed and for some reason ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - exactly what we needed and for some reason seems much "heartier" than the one that came with the meter. Wish we would have discovered Amazon for Diabetic Supplies much, much sooner - we would have saved a fortune!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: It works but broke after a while. And i test only every 3 days. I am not diabetic but my family has a history so I always test. Already bought another lancing device.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed, easy to use, is as the seller described.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: These masks are easy to retrieve from box, easy to use and they work great.

customer_reviews.title: The Price is Right!!!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all. Works perfectly with my Contour Next Blood Glucose Monitor.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the lancing device. It’s my favorite kind. Easy to use: pop it in, click, remove lancet.

customer_reviews.title: These are about the worst lancets I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are about the worst lancets I have ever used. They don't stay in the device. They are floppy and sometimes eject when that is not what you had in mind. I would not recommend these to anyone who cares about ease, well-being or health.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Haskvitz

customer_reviews.title: DECEPTIVE, BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: My previous lancer is worn out so I bought this combo. I’m glad it was cheap because the lancets they sell with it DO NOT FIT THIS LANCET. buyer beware .
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Renda

customer_reviews.title: Finger-Stick Relief
customer_reviews.text: Misplaced my lancet device during a move & Bayer has the one I like the most - there are others, but this one is easy to manipulate AND regulates depth more definitively than most others!!! Would buy again & again & again...

customer_reviews.title: Good device.
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived ok. I prefer the Microlet2 device over others but my only gripe is that it does not automatically eject the lancet. Otherwise I prefer it over others (even ones that ejected automatically).

customer_reviews.title: I was glad that I was able to find an inexpensive device ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my patient who received a free meter with his insurance however it did not contain a lancing device. I was glad that I was able to find an inexpensive device and with prime i was able to give to him fairly quickly. No complaints on his end with the device either....
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Lancet review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Lancet. I've been using one that doesn't quite fit right into my blood sugar packet. This is much better.
customer_reviews.author: F. Chesley

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Easy
customer_reviews.text: It feels sturdy. I have rheumatoid arthritis in my hands and it's difficult for me to do some things. This makes it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher James

customer_reviews.title: I really like this affordable device.
customer_reviews.text: Pain free compared to my older lancet. I highly recommend this device.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Lancing device. It works great and you can adjust for a lighter or deeper poke.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It's a little slippery if you hold it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's a little slippery if you hold it lightly. But it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WORK JUST FINE. Till I tried it. The lancets do not work in this device. They sent the wrong lancets
customer_reviews.author: JOHN REDICAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Meter and Lancet
customer_reviews.text: Works very well- easy to use. Very happy with this purchase. Happy it arrived so quickly after placing the order. The price was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy  Daybreak

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: I threw the lancets away and the device has already stuck and wouldn't release the lancet. An inferior product
customer_reviews.author: Artist in bloom

customer_reviews.title: An Amazon Buy
customer_reviews.text: I received this product 2 days ago,,so far they are working good..
customer_reviews.author: pica3

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on arm
customer_reviews.text: It was ok but would not work on my arm like it was suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: After using MANY different lancing devices that tore my fingers up, I decided to try this one. So far, I have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mcraig24

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: lancing device was removed from package. Microlet lancets don't fit walgreens lancing device. Totally overpaid for 100 lancets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: The lancing device is difficult to use. When the lancets are loaded, getting them to rise enough to puncture the skin is difficult.

customer_reviews.title: Nice service
customer_reviews.text: Fast service and I prefer the 30 gauge (smallest) lancet. I, personally find the microjet lancet holder flimsy (made by Bayer)

customer_reviews.title: excellent replacement for OEM
customer_reviews.text: replaced my broken Freestyle lancing device - does a great job

customer_reviews.text: It a box of lancets an the device to use them...I thought the price was excellent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LANCING DEVICE IS GOOD YOU DONT FEEL TOO MUCH PAIN WORK VERY GOOD

customer_reviews.text: This lancing devise has a wider grip area making it easier to hold.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase and seller
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Product is as described and more than reasonably priced. Very happy with purchase and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good companions to the Bayer Breeze 2
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that I would say that I Love This Product...as the five stars are labeled, but I have found that the device and lancets do what they are supposed to do, with no more pain than would be found with anyone else's "tools". I can't recall exactly how long the device lasts until replacement is required...........but replacement is ultimately necessary. This is not a financial burden, given the inexpensiveness of the device...........at least to this date.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great devise
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a devise that works just as good as more expensive devises
customer_reviews.author: KW in Michigan

product_meta.title: Microlet Lancing Device + 100 Active Forward 30g Lancets
product_meta.description: Complete Blood Lancing Kit: 1 Lancing Device + 100 Lancets (30 Gauge)
feature_bullets: Complete Blood Lancing Kit: 1 Lancing Device + 100 Lancets (30 Gauge)
Microlet 2 Lancing Device has a multi level adjustable tip for easy and adjustable skin penetration
Active Forward 30 Gauge Lancets are durable yet thin enough to cause less pain
